title: Foundations of Online Learning Satisfaction Prediction Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Analysis, Understanding Machine Learning Concepts, and Python Programming Experience
context.additional_context: Online practice-oriented course for undergraduate science students, combining real-time sessions and asynchronous tasks. Practical exercises conducted on individual devices.

learning_goals: One can explain the basic structure and learning principles of artificial neural network (ANN) models
One can identify factors influencing online learning satisfaction (self-efficacy, content interaction, etc.) and perform data preprocessing
One can build a learning satisfaction prediction model using ANNs and evaluate its performance via accuracy/confusion matrix
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
